page.title: 11The Rec at King's Sutton
page.content: The Recreation ground is in the centre of King's Sutton. At one end, the park is just grass, and that place is for playing football or games. At the other end, there are swings, a large slide, wooden climbing frames and rocking animals. It is a very popular place. Many chidren go there to play. It is also lovely for picnicking, partly because it is surrounded by trees. I think it is very unusual for there to be such a large playground in the centre of a village, but everyone enjoys it. I think that it is a very good park, and it is well looked after.
